title: Forgot login username for my second account...
body:
I recently wanted to start leveling a second account to play with my friends, however, I seem to have forgotten the username... I beleive that the email i used is one that I got rid of as well. I know the in-game name, and most likely the password, I just need the username. If any Riot employee or someoen would want to help me recover it, I would be greatly appreciative.


EDIT:
I HAVE COME TO THE REALIZATION THAT DUDE TO INACTIVITY RIOT HAS SHUT DOWN THE ACCOUNT... IM STUPID

replies.body: We don't close accounts for inactivity.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can help with recovering your account.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
